messages.content: What is ComfyUI-N-Sidebar?
ComfyUI-N-Sidebar is a simple sidebar for ComfyUI.
What does the sidebar add to ComfyUI?
The sidebar provides features like drag and drop nodes, pinned favorites, search functionality, expand/collapse categories, node preview, and design compatibility with ComfyUI themes.
How do I install ComfyUI-N-Sidebar?
To install, clone the repository into your ComfyUI `custom_nodes` directory.
How do I uninstall ComfyUI-N-Sidebar?
To uninstall, delete the `ComfyUI-N-Sidebar` folder from your ComfyUI `custom_nodes` directory.
How do I update ComfyUI-N-Sidebar?
Navigate to the cloned repo and use `git pull` to update.
What are the keyboard shortcuts for the sidebar?
Use `Alt+Z` to toggle the sidebar and `Alt+X` to focus on the search field.
What are the features of the sidebar?

Features include drag and drop nodes, pinned nodes, search functions within nodes and categories, expand/collapse functions, node reordering, node preview, design compatibility with ComfyUI themes, and custom values from ComfyUI settings.
What are the additional features of ComfyUI-N-Sidebar?
It saves the width and minimized state of the sidebar in cookies.
How can I contribute to ComfyUI-N-Sidebar?
You can report issues or suggest improvements by opening an issue or submitting a pull request on the GitHub repository.
How can I donate to ComfyUI-N-Sidebar?
Donations can be made through the link provided on the GitHub page.
What license does ComfyUI-N-Sidebar use?
ComfyUI-N-Sidebar is licensed under the MIT License.
What are the planned features for ComfyUI-N-Sidebar?
Planned improvements include better search functionality and better node preview.
